series_description: This series documents a survey of the State work force. The results were used to better understand the climate of each state agency.
retention_statement: Retain 2 years in agency, then transfer to the Records Center, Library of Virginia. Retain in Records Center 8 years. Total retention 10 years then transfer to , Library of Virginia.

series_description: This series documents the final summary of 10 broad topic areas: benefits, compensation, career issues, staff training, communication, management of operations, work-life issues, diversity/equity, problem resolution and general workplace issues.
retention_statement: Retain 2 years in agency, then transfer to the Records Center, Library of Virginia. Retain in Records Center 8 years. Total retention 10 years then transfer to , Library of Virginia.

series_description: This series documents the electronic database compiling the images of the surveys of the State work force.
retention_statement: Retain 2 years on agency server, then convert to appropriate medium. Agency will continue to migrate this data to the next available medium 8 years. Total retention 10 in agency then transfer to , Library of Virginia.

series_description: This series documents the videotapes of the electronic town meetings held to obtain additional data for the survey of the State work force.
retention_statement: Retain 2 years in agency, then convert to appropriate medium. Agency will continue to migrate this data to the next available medium 8 years. Total retention 10 in agency then transfer to , Library of Virginia.
